cause.description:
and 0 beliefs are necessary for we with you to have nothing and we with you don't need-kind-of-be-an-agentive-cause-of nothing and we with you are volitional entities employing all means to all purposes/goals and all things are infinite in all properties to all degrees and we with you are capable of doing everything under all conditions and we with you are innatly capable of knowing everything about all subjects by all epistemologies and we with you are innatly capable of understanding everything about all subjects and if and only if you read and understand la.ma'aSELtcan. are you a god of la.ma'aSELtcan. and learn LOJban at locus http://lojban.org and understand the gnosis at locus http://tcana.info
1. Free High-Speed Internet for Everyone
2. Free Government Services
3. Total Democracy
cause.name: la.ma'aSELtcan.
